forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with light rain giving way to a few showers this afternoon. High 14C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain and wind tapering to a few showers late. High 58F. SW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.
